changetracker module¶

Changetracker A filesystem monitor

class changetracker.ChangeTracker(path=None, interval=1.0, handler=None)¶

Monitors a directory for changes

run()¶

This runs the ChangeTracker after its creation and returns, when a KeyboardInterrupt occurs.

update()¶
class changetracker.DefaultChangeHandler¶
on_added(item)¶
on_changed(item)¶
on_removed(item)¶
class changetracker.TrackedItem(path)¶
update()¶

updates the current state and modtime of the item return True if modtime has changed, False otherwise

changetracker.recursive_list(rootpath)¶

Generates all paths of subordinate items in the directory “rootpath” doesn’t follow symlinks
